A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Mark Hamill did a good job despite being given such a worthless script. Actually\, I like the actors\, all of them\, but the entire movie is awful from beginning to end. I watched The Force Awakens and Rogue One twice in the cinema\, The Last Jedi once... and after I now recently watched it on blue ray too I feel like I'm probably never gonna watch it again. I feel very sorry for Mark Hamill for what they did to him with this movie.
